languages.text: {n}Паскаль неуверенно интересуется:{/n} "Факт того, что данный серф находится в заключении, а следовательно, уже однажды обманул доверие верных Империуму слуг, должен быть упомянут? Или он очевиден мирян... персонам, не посвященным в таинства священной логики?"

{n}Pasqal enquires demurely,{/n} "Does the fact that this serf is presently confined and therefore has previously betrayed the trust of the Imperium's servants need to be vocalised? Or is it evident to the lait— persons uninitiated in the sacred mysteries of logic?"
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль неуверенно интересуется:{/n} "Факт того, что данный серф находится в заключении, а следовательно, уже однажды обманул доверие верных Империуму слуг, должен быть упомянут? Или он очевиден мирян... персонам, не посвященным в таинства священной логики?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal enquires demurely,{/n} "Does the fact that this serf is presently confined and therefore has previously betrayed the trust of the Imperium's servants need to be vocalised? Or is it evident to laype— persons uninitiated in the sacred mysteries of logic?"

{n}Pasqal enquires demurely,{/n} "Does the fact that this serf is presently confined and therefore has previously betrayed the trust of the Imperium's servants need to be vocalised? Or is it evident to laype— persons uninitiated in the sacred mysteries of logic?"

{n}Pasqal enquires demurely,{/n} "Does the fact that this serf is presently confined and therefore has previously betrayed the trust of the Imperium's servants need to be vocalised? Or is it evident to laype— persons uninitiated in the sacred mysteries of logic?"

{n}Pasqal enquires demurely,{/n} "Does the fact that this serf is presently confined and therefore has previously betrayed the trust of the Imperium's servants need to be vocalised? Or is it evident to laype— persons uninitiated in the sacred mysteries of logic?"

{n}Pasqal enquires demurely,{/n} "Does the fact that this serf is presently confined and therefore has previously betrayed the trust of the Imperium's servants need to be vocalised? Or is it evident to the lait— persons uninitiated in the sacred mysteries of logic?"

{n}Pasqal enquires demurely,{/n} "Does the fact that this serf is presently confined and therefore has previously betrayed the trust of the Imperium's servants need to be vocalised? Or is it evident to the lait— persons uninitiated in the sacred mysteries of logic?"

languages.text: {n}Pasqal erkundigt sich nüchtern:{/n} "Muss ich extra erwähnen, dass dieser Leibeigene derzeit in Haft ist und damit wohl schon früher das Vertrauen der Diener des Imperiums missbraucht hat? Oder ist das offensichtlich für Laien – Personen, die in den heiligen Mysterien der Logik nicht bewandert sind?"
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal enquires demurely,{/n} "Does the fact that this serf is presently confined and therefore has previously betrayed the trust of the Imperium's servants need to be vocalised? Or is it evident to the lait— persons uninitiated in the sacred mysteries of logic?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal erkundigt sich nüchtern:{/n} "Muss ich extra erwähnen, dass dieser Leibeigene derzeit in Haft ist und damit wohl schon früher das Vertrauen der Diener des Imperiums missbraucht hat? Oder ist das offensichtlich für Laien – Personen, die in den heiligen Mysterien der Logik nicht bewandert sind?"

languages.text: {n}Avec réserve, Pasqal demande :{/n} « Faut-il mentionner que ce serf est actuellement détenu, ce qui signifie qu'il a déjà au moins une fois trahi la confiance des agents de l'Imperium ? Ou ce fait est-il suffisamment évident pour les profa... pour les personnes non initiées aux mystères sacrés de la logique ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal enquires demurely,{/n} "Does the fact that this serf is presently confined and therefore has previously betrayed the trust of the Imperium's servants need to be vocalised? Or is it evident to the lait— persons uninitiated in the sacred mysteries of logic?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec réserve, Pasqal demande :{/n} « Faut-il mentionner que ce serf est actuellement détenu, ce qui signifie qu'il a déjà au moins une fois trahi la confiance des agents de l'Imperium ? Ou ce fait est-il suffisamment évident pour les profa... pour les personnes non initiées aux mystères sacrés de la logique ? »

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡彬彬有礼地问道。{/n}“这位仆役之所以遭到了囚禁，是因为他之前背叛了帝国忠仆的信任，这样的事实需要我说出来吗？还是说，哪怕对于不了解逻辑学神圣奥秘的外行……普通人而言，这样的事实也同样显而易见？”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal enquires demurely,{/n} "Does the fact that this serf is presently confined and therefore has previously betrayed the trust of the Imperium's servants need to be vocalised? Or is it evident to the lait— persons uninitiated in the sacred mysteries of logic?"

traits.locale_text: {/n}帕斯卡彬彬有礼地问道。{n}“这位仆役之所以遭到了囚禁，是因为他之前背叛了帝国忠仆的信任，这样的事实需要我说出来吗？还是说，哪怕对于不了解逻辑学神圣奥秘的教外人士而言，这样的事实也同样显而易见？”

languages.text: {n}パスカルは控えめに尋ねた。{/n}「この農奴が現在監禁されており、それゆえ以前に帝国の従者たちの信頼を裏切っていたという事実を声高に主張する必要があるのだろうか？それとも、それは一般の者たち、つまり論理の神聖な神秘を知らない者たちには明らかなことなのか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal enquires demurely,{/n} "Does the fact that this serf is presently confined and therefore has previously betrayed the trust of the Imperium's servants need to be vocalised? Or is it evident to the lait— persons uninitiated in the sacred mysteries of logic?"

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは遠慮がちに尋ねる。{/n}「この労奴が現在閉じ込められ、以前帝国の下僕の信頼を裏切ったという事実は言う必要があるか？もしくは、俗人ーー論理の聖なる秘儀の教えを受けていない者たちには、言わなくても分かることなのか？」
{n}パスカルは控えめに尋ねた。{/n}「この農奴が現在監禁されており、それゆえ以前に帝国の従者たちの信頼を裏切っていたという事実を声高に主張する必要があるのだろうか？それとも、それは一般の者たち、つまり論理の神聖な神秘を知らない者たちには明らかなことなのか？」

languages.text: {n}Pasqal pregunta recatadamente,{/n} «¿Debería señalar que este individuo está actualmente confinado y, por lo tanto, ha traicionado la confianza de los sirvientes del Imperium? ¿O es evidente incluso para los lai... las personas no iniciadas en los sagrados misterios de la lógica?».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal enquires demurely,{/n} "Does the fact that this serf is presently confined and therefore has previously betrayed the trust of the Imperium's servants need to be vocalised? Or is it evident to the lait— persons uninitiated in the sacred mysteries of logic?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal pregunta recatadamente,{/n} ¿Debería señalar que este individuo está actualmente confinado y, por lo tanto, ha traicionado la confianza de los sirvientes del Imperium? ¿O es evidente incluso para las personas no iniciadas en los sagrados misterios de la lógica?».

languages.text: {n}Pasqal ölçülü bir şekilde soruyor.{/n} "Bu kulun şu an hapiste olduğu ve hapse atılmasının sebebinin de İmparatorluk hizmetkârlarının güvenine ihanet etmiş olması gerçeğinin dillendirilmesine gerek var mı? Yoksa bu, mantığın kutsal gizemlerine nail olmayanlar için çok mu bariz?"
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal enquires demurely,{/n} "Does the fact that this serf is presently confined and therefore has previously betrayed the trust of the Imperium's servants need to be vocalised? Or is it evident to the lait— persons uninitiated in the sacred mysteries of logic?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal ölçülü bir şekilde soruyor:{/n} "Bu kulun şu an hapiste olduğu ve hapse atılmasının sebebinin de İmparatorluk hizmetkârlarının güvenine ihanet etmiş olması gerçeğinin dillendirilmesine gerek var mı? Yoksa bu, mantığın kutsal gizemlerine nail olmayanlar için çok mu bariz?"
